author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Idera Pharmaceuticals Enters Into A Clinical Development Support Agreement With Pillar Partners Foundation
text:
April 16 (Reuters) - Idera Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* IDERA PHARMACEUTICALS ENTERS INTO A CLINICAL DEVELOPMENT SUPPORT AGREEMENT WITH PILLAR PARTNERS FOUNDATION TO EXPAND THE CLINICAL RESEARCH ON IMO-2125 BEYOND PD-1 REFRACTORY MELANOMA
* IDERA PHARMACEUTICALS INC - UNDER TERMS OF AGREEMENT, PILLAR PARTNERS TO PROVIDE DIRECT FUNDING TO EXPAND CLINICAL RESEARCH OF IMO-2125 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
